content: Published reference includes every GA endpoint with request/response examples, auth requirements, pagination, rate limits, and error catalog.
Quickstart tutorial validated by at least two non-author engineers (time-to-first-success ≤ 15 minutes).
Language SDK parity table kept current (TypeScript, Python, Go, Java, Kotlin, Swift, Rust) with last-reviewed timestamp ≤ 30 days.
Broken-link scan, OpenAPI validation, and code sample tests run in CI and passing for the release.
Doc search analytics configured; top 10 queries mapped to owned pages with < 5% 404/anchor error rate.
